snippet: YARNELL--Dr. Gail E.,our dear Gail has left us suddenly. Beloved daughter of Marvin and the late Selene and Suzanne, adored sister of David (Lisa), Steven (Jennifer) and Elisa (Brian), aunt to Brent, Chase, Danae and Leslie and friend to all. Services on Sunday, March 13, at 1:15pm at Cedar Park Cemetery, 735 Forest Avenue, Paramus, NJ. 1/3
lead_paragraph: YARNELL--Dr. Gail E.,our dear Gail has left us suddenly. Beloved daughter of Marvin and the late Selene and Suzanne, adored sister of David (Lisa), Steven (Jennifer) and Elisa (Brian), aunt to Brent, Chase, Danae and Leslie and friend to all. Services on Sunday, March 13, at 1:15pm at Cedar Park Cemetery, 735 Forest Avenue, Paramus, NJ. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  YARNELL, DR. GAIL E.
